errors.missing_arguments: Please include all required arguments. Check *help* for usage.
errors.start_requires_username: *Start* requires a username. Check *help* for usage.
errors.already_registered: You already used *start* to register before. Check *help* for usage.
errors.not_registered: You have not registered using *start* yet. Check *help* for usage.
errors.no_users: There appears to be no users. Ask a bot admin for help.
errors.dlg_no_desc_or_author: The current dialogue has no description or title. Ask a bot admin for help.
errors.dlg_no_input: The current dialogue has no input. If you get this error repeatedly and believe there should be an input, ask a bot admin for help.

0.author: '...cRaCkLee SPark...'
0.description: 'Sparking and smoking, your ship limps away from the clutches of the [aliens]. In the skirmish, your pilot was killed. As second-in-command, the responsibility of getting the citizens aboard this vessel falls to you. As you run up to take control of the ship, the computer asks for confirmation of your codex.'

0.author: f'[{db["users"][user_id]["username"]}] Your information and biometrics have been accepted.'
0.description: f'{db["users"][user_id]["username"]} is now eligible for manual operation of this vessel. All clearances are granted. **WARNING**: This vessel has sustained heavy damage. 1 unit of fuel remaining. Suggested course of action: Flee to a system near (0,0). The [aliens] will not follow.'

1.author: f'[{db["users"][user_id]["username"]}] Use ".jump" to jump to a system.'
1.description: '**Reminder**: You only have enough fuel to jump to an adjacent system.'
